import axios from "axios"; import React from "react"; import { Outlet, Link, useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useGlobalContext } from "../context"; import "./Layout.scss"; const Layout = () => { const { isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn } = useGlobalContext(); const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); function handleLogout() { axios .post("/logout", { email: isLoggedIn.userEmail, password: isLoggedIn.userPassword, }) .then((response) => { console.log(response); sessionStorage.clear(); setIsLoggedIn(false); navigate("/login"); }) .catch((err) => { console.log("*****", err); }); } return ( <>
